name: QuoStar Solutions Limited
tagline: London IT Outsourcing and Cloud services
description: QuoStar is a rapid-growth, privately-held business consultancy and information technology firm headquartered in the United Kingdom. We deliver strategic and technical consultancy, typically focused around process and continual improvement methods. Our industry and business-process knowledge, coupled with our expertise in emerging technologies, allows us to formulate and implement solutions with and for our clients which lift them above the competition.
